content: निर्दिश् {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To point out, indicate, show; एकैकं निर्दिशन् <ls>Ś. 7</ls>; अंगुल्या निर्दिशति &c. {@--2@} To assign, give; निर्दिष्टां कुलपतिना स पर्णशालामध्यास्य <ls>R. 1. 95.</ls> {@--3@} To allude to, mention, make a reference to. {@--4@} To foretell, predict. {@--5@} To advise, recommend. {@--6@} To tell, communicate. {@--7@} To enjoin, direct. {@--8@} To enumerate, specify, name. {@--9@} To define, determine. {@--10@} To describe. {@--11@} To denounce, accuse.
